item.title: By: Judith
item.dc:creator: Judith
item.description: <p>I don't know if anyone heard this yesterday but there was a cracking joke played by the BBC, they did a report on the horse racing and said that they are bringning in a new rule tht "all horses and jockey's will be made to ride at a speed of 30mph until the first post, and that they will have speed camera's to check this" After this loads of people emailed, phone complaining thinking this would happen. 1 A speed camera can not read Horse Power! 2 I don't think so, can you really image this poor man/ woman standing there with a speed gun waiting in hope!! well done to the BBC for a cracking Fools</p>
item.content:encoded: I don’t know if anyone heard this yesterday but there was a cracking joke played by the BBC, they did a report on the horse racing and said that they are bringning in a new rule tht “all horses and jockey’s will be made to ride at a speed of 30mph until the first post, and that they will have speed camera’s to check this” After this loads of people emailed, phone complaining thinking this would happen. 1 A speed camera can not read Horse Power! 2 I don’t think so, can you really image this poor man/ woman standing there with a speed gun waiting in hope!! well done to the BBC for a cracking Fools
